EmailTemplate.subject: Secondary Residential Trip
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Salutation} {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName},
I have spoken to all of the trip leaders to report that the Year 7, 8 and 10 students have all arrived safely and on time. The Year 7's were on the beach doing surf exercises when I phoned and it sounded as if they were enjoying themselves. Year 8's had just arrived and had a bumpy flight whilst the Year 10's were causing havoc with their team building games.
The Year 9 students do not land until later and I will send an email out tomorrow to confirm their safe arrival as stated in the letter.
I'm certain that the students will enjoy the trip and I look forward to hearing the stories and seeing the pictures on the blog (technology willing) and on the students return.
Best wishes,
Mr. Iain Ruck
The British School of Guangzhou
+8620 8709 4788
www.bsg.org.cn
